about_the_game:
The DLC weapon will be located at the START or first checkpoint of each location. They're placed on a special stand or table.

Add the VIS P-35(p) pistol to your equipment!
This is the German version of the legendary Polish wz. 35 VIS. After taking over the F.B. Radom factory, the Wehrmacht resumed production in 1940 under the name P-35(p) removing the Polish emblem and the year of production. In total the occupants produced 312,000 pieces in several versions, which were gradually simplified. A small number of the pistols were manufactured in Poland, under conspiratorial conditions, from parts taken from the factory, with the barrels being made in the workshops of the Home Army in Warsaw.
detailed_description:
The DLC weapon will be located at the START or first checkpoint of each location. They're placed on a special stand or table.

Add the VIS P-35(p) pistol to your equipment!
This is the German version of the legendary Polish wz. 35 VIS. After taking over the F.B. Radom factory, the Wehrmacht resumed production in 1940 under the name P-35(p) removing the Polish emblem and the year of production. In total the occupants produced 312,000 pieces in several versions, which were gradually simplified. A small number of the pistols were manufactured in Poland, under conspiratorial conditions, from parts taken from the factory, with the barrels being made in the workshops of the Home Army in Warsaw.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: VIS P-35(p) - a German copy of the legendary Polish wz. 35 VIS. A total of 312,000 pieces were produced, partly produced under conspiratorial conditions, from parts taken from the factory and assembled in the workshops of the Home Army in Warsaw.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
